# 习惯致富

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xiguan-zhifu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xiguan-zhifu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xiguan-zhifu
xiguan-zhifu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xiguan-zhifu
xiguan-zhifu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
